record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1920. Fifth row: N. B. Johnson, A. A. Stagg, (coach), and F. M. Walker (assistant coach); fourth row: H. W. Lewis, W. D. Pheney, R. M. Cole, A. M. Baird, and J. C. Reber; third row: E. H. Palmer, E. F. Rouse, H. O. Crisler, P. D. Hinkle, J. P. Neff, and O. E. Strohmeier; second row: G. H. Hartong, C. E. McGuire, C. C. Jackson (captain), C. M. Redmon, and R. T. Halladay; first row: R. F. Barker, L. W. Tatage, R. A. Timme, B. E. Hutchinson, and H. L. Hanisch.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
